name: Airsonic
short_description: Open-source music streaming server with web player and mobile app support.
description: Airsonic is a free, open-source web-based music player and streamer that lets you access your music collection from anywhere. It organizes your music with metadata, albums, artists, genres, and provides powerful search. Features include multi-user support with individual playlists, transcoding for various formats, podcast support,jukebox mode for parties, HTTP streaming for any player, and integration with various Sonos, Chromecast, and AirPlay devices. There's also an Android app for offline playback. Perfect for building your personal Spotify alternative.
usecases: Stream your music collection to any browser or device.
Create playlists and share music with family members.
Use jukebox mode to let guests choose music at parties.
Access your music library remotely via the web interface.
notes: Android app available for mobile listening
Multiple users with personal libraries supported
